item.title: 01.155 Breaking
item.description: Wednesday, July 27, 2022 Everywhere Across the world, both horrors and beauties manifested, from the trivial to nation-breaking. A tremor shook across Manitoba down through Texas and the land split apart in a violent motion. The new land that appeared was shrouded in a thick mist. People caught in the strange mists that poured forth first felt an itching and then a burning and then started screaming as their flesh was eaten away.

item.title: 01.154 Coda
item.description: Two days later (Wednesday, July 27, 2022) Throne, The Hidden Kingdom of the Emperor Four of them, Ella, Kothin, Zaidu, and Adrahasis warily approached the castle. Arcsa remained at the campsite with another Aqrabuamelu to tend his leg. There was no cover after the trees had burnt away, but ash and smoke lingered. The proud pennants that had flown above were blackened with soot. They held up their riot shields in defense.

item.title: 01.056 Debrief
item.description: Bahu hears all the bad stuff they have gotten up to

item.title: 01.123 Old Friends
item.description: Ekerri visits old friends

item.title: 01.055 Bullseye
item.description: The bug squad needs some healing

item.title: 01.150 Outtakes - Furious
item.description: Twenty years ago The mean streets of New York City Ella pulled up to the stoplight and looked over. She could hear the sound behind her and, as she had thought, it was Jade, the legend of New York City was there. The light was red, the streets were empty. This was it. Nothing needed to be said. She could feel her muscles tense. The light stayed stubbornly at red, but she watched the cross-light for the cue.

item.title: 01.113 Veils
item.description: The next day; Day 12 (Tuesday, May 10, 2022) Undisclosed location, New Jersey, United States Ella was no longer intubated, the turbulence and strange glowing of the tub had wound down. But she didn’t wake up. They kept the IVs going, the first batch of trauma and burn doctors were sent home with large payments and very, very pointed warnings to keep their mouth shut. They were, in fact, blindfolded and removed without ever knowing where they had stayed.

item.title: 01.110 Exfiltrate
item.description: The same day (Monday, May 2, 2022) Adirondacks, Tupper Lake, New York, United States Zaidu groggily woke up. And scrambled to pull his handgun without thought but his holster was empty. It was night and the moon was overhead. He had a pounding pain and when he reached up he could feel a lump on his head. His left arm screamed in pain as he lifted it. When he examined it, he saw the bullet wound that had punched through his plate at an angle and was still, according to his quick inspection, lodged in there.

item.title: 01.111 The Soup
item.description: Three days later, Day 7 (Thursday, May 5, 2022) Undisclosed location, New Jersey, United States Ella was back in the soup, as Charlie called it. The burn tub was filled to the brim with stem cells, growth factors, collagen matrices, and other assorted proteins and nutrients. And it glowed in pulsing waves. No longer subtle, it sometimes pulsed bright enough Charlie had to cover her eyes. Ella was laying nude in the pool, and her skin was healing.

item.title: 01.115 Exposure
item.description: The next day (Wednesday, May 11, 2022) Undisclosed location, New Jersey, United States Ella forced herself out of bed and almost fell over. Her legs felt unsteady after the time in bed. She held onto the side of her bed and untangled the various wires and IV tube. She had finally gotten them to remove the catheter that morning and now she really needed to pee. After, she went out into the hall.

item.title: 01.048 Compass
item.description: Jade has moral qualms

item.title: 01.114 Waking
item.description: The same day; Day 12 (Tuesday, May 10, 2022) Undisclosed location, New Jersey, United States Peelatchachía told Isaac that being around Ella had become too painful: the power she was emitting felt like sharp jabs. It went on to say that Ella had done something remarkably stupid and was lucky to be recovering. Isaac had asked what was happening to her or if she would wake up, but the raven had just flown off.

item.title: 01.112 Concentrate
item.description: Four days later, Day 11 (Monday, May 9, 2022) Undisclosed location, New Jersey, United States Navneet and Henry sat together in the room regarding the burn pool and their daughter in it. Her burns had healed almost entirely at this point. But the water churned and frothed almost violently at this point. The doctors had all reluctantly given up. Nothing they were doing was more effective than the burn tub. One of the doctors, a noted burn expert, Dr.

item.title: 01.103 SNAFU
item.description: Jade and Craig get a little too creative

So some stories and investigations are short and end quickly. I realize that Ella being stuck in the woods for a week might have a lot of people going, when the hell will magic become a major part of this story? So I thought Ella’s hunting week would be a good week to meet some of the other characters and see their perspectives.

item.title: 01.044 Interlude - Apsáalooke
item.description: This chapter starts as a standard western setup and I pivot it near the end to show that not all these spirits waking up are bad. They are not a horrors, but complicated and strange. I apologize if I didn’t get the vibe right or if there is a bit of stereotyping going on. Wish I knew more native Americans to validate the depiction better. Watching interviews and researching just don’t get the right sensitivity.

item.title: 01.072 Increments
item.description: A little slice of life in the 0.1%. I love writing Charlie chapters but often think she is a bit predictable persona wise. That is okay… but I would like to give her a bit more depth and nuance and maybe something a bit more, it hasn’t come to me yet. But she writes her own chapters and I originally thought this would go another way. Her father is an asshole, no question.

item.title: Anatoly Fedoriw
item.description: Ella’s mentor for her graduate program.

item.title: Charlotte 'Charlie' Harris
item.description: Relationships Mother Melissa Harris Father. Alistair Harris Cousin Astor Harris Ella’s best friend and fellow first-year Physics masters student, but is partying a bit too much since her move up from University of Georgia. From a rich Southern heritage in Savannah of the sort that has debutante balls (which she ditched out of to get drunk and have sex with her boyfriend in her parents car)

item.title: Adrahasis
item.description: Crèche: Cairo, Egypt Traditional weapon specialty: battle axe Adrahasis is the unofficial leader of the cohort and is considered a bit of a philosopher warrior of the group. He has a strong grasp of strategy but is not the strongest at tactics and on the ground decisions.

item.title: Akhlys
item.description: Akhlys was the guide for Ekerri during his visit to the Killing Gardens

item.title: Alicia Martin
item.description: A thirteen year old Caucasian homeless child who “adopted” Sally

item.title: Ansheth
item.description: Fanatical assassin of the drow serving Ekerri.

item.title: Aoife
item.description: 158cm / 5'2" petite with golden skin, blue butterfly wings. Ella was almost seduced by her during a party.

item.title: Bahu
item.description: Crèche: Kur DOB: 3120 BC

item.title: Craig Ndereba
item.description: Relationships Sister Jade Ndereba Boyfriend Luke Slattery Jade’s brother. Think 183cm / 6’ of pure, intimidating muscle, inky almost blue black skin, witty as hell, fast as hell, and about to go pro in MMA. Senior at Columbia on full scholarship in both history and economics.

item.title: Davcina
item.description: Crèche: Cairo, Egypt Traditional weapon: Dual long knives Davcina is tall and handsome with stern features. Her eyes were a storm at sea blue-grey, and she had high sharp cheekbones. She is very angular looking and has a severe face but is actually very sweet and compassionate. Likes hugs type of person.

item.title: Djara
item.description: Djara is the true name for Donna Arthurs

item.title: Do-Yun Park
item.description: Relationships Spouse Johanna Son Hanuel Park Great-grandson Jae-Young Park

item.title: Donna Arthurs
item.description: Ella’s sparring partner. Very tall at 177cm / 5'10" and fit. Generally a flat affect with little emotion shown. Strawberry blonde pixie cut, grey-blue eyes, and freckled skin.

item.title: Duke of Glaciers and the Long Cold Night
Ekerri (Ascended)
item.description: Strange monarch who crowned Elli. Obsidian skin and glowing white crystalline eyes

item.title: Etana
item.description: Crèche: Cairo, Egypt Traditional weapon: bastard sword Etana is long and lean with dark long hair in long braids with beads woven into the ends of them. He is extraordinarily attractive but has a raspy voice from a training incident where he got punched in the throat. Personality is shy and withdrawn generally.

item.title: Hanuel Park
item.description: Relationships Father Do-Yun Park Mother Johanna Grandson Jae-Young Park

item.title: Harlan Slattery
item.description: Relationships Brother Luke Slattery Luke’s identical twin - no beard. From Texas.

item.title: Inta
item.description: Daybreak Tribe Nüwa, Master of Nakra, with standard coloring

item.title: Jade Ndereba
item.description: Relationships Brother Craig Ndereba Roommate Ella Jindal-Witten Ella’s studio roommate from Kenya, tall 172m / 5'8" with dark black skin and leaning way into a 1970s style including massive afro. Taking a masters in Film & Television at NYU. A bit conceited as she used to model across Africa, but struggling with not being top of the heap in NYC.

item.title: Kothin
item.description: The first dwarf that Ella has met. Long beard, 121cm / 4’ tall. Faceted inhuman features with solid black eyes.

item.title: Luke Slattery
item.description: Relationships Brother Harlan Slattery Boyfriend Craig Ndereba A big cuddly bear of a man with strawberry blonde hair and beard, a comfortably round belly and green eyes. Craig’s boyfriend. From Texas.

item.title: Nyx
item.description: Nyx is the hereditary name of the Queens of the Keres.

item.title: Park, Jae-Young
item.description: Relationships Great-grandfather Do-Yun Park Great-grandmother Johanna Grandfather Hanuel Park Ex-girlfriend Ella Jindal-Witten Ella’s ex-boyfriend. In human guise, he is 180cm / 5'11" tall and handsome with sharp cheekbones and a boyish haircut. Without his ring, his elfin features come to the fore, his eyes cant to an extreme degree, his features become even more defined and sharper, his ears pointed.

item.title: Queenie
item.description: Kingsnake Nüwa

item.title: Sally
item.description: Daybreak Tribe Nüwa with teal coloring

item.title: Tauthe
item.description: Crèche: Cairo, Egypt Traditional weapon: spear Tauthe is a bit shorter and rounder than the other Aqrabuamelu. She is the opposite of Davcina in that she has a round open face but is a bit caustic.

item.title: Vichama
item.description: Daybreak Tribe Nüwa with teal coloring. Master of Portal, suburb of Nakkra and gateway to the human.

item.title: Zana
item.description: Names Zana Species Aqrabuamelu Creche Imperial Province of Norway Affilitations Aqrabuamelu; NSA

item.description: The High Priestess gets demoted

item.title: 01.018 Farflung Interests
item.description: Kothin has the black lung

item.title: 01.017 Aqrabuamelu
item.description: Arcsa discovers a way out of Kur

item.title: Eesha 'Ella' Eleanor Jindal-Witten
item.description: Relationships Father Henry Jindal-Witten Mother Navneet Jindal-Witten Brother Harish “Harry” Jindal-Witten Ex-boyfriend Jae-Young Park Roommate Jade Ndereba Our heroine is 167cm / 5'6" with bronze skin from her half-Indian heritage. Brown eyes naturally and black hair. She starts the story at 25 years old and first-year Physics Ph.D student at NYU.

item.title: Harish 'Harry' Jindal-Witten
item.description: Relationships Father Henry Jindal-Witten Mother Navneet Jindal-Witten Sister Eesha Jindal-Witten The annoying little brother. Senior at Francis Lewis High School in Queens.

item.title: Henry Jindal-Witten
item.description: Relationships Spouse Navneet Jindal-Witten Son Harish Jindal-Witten Daughter Eesha Jindal-Witten Ella’s father. Tall (188cm / 6'2"), broad shouldered, a light dusting of freckles, blue-green eyes, and tousled brown hair. Basically a very handsome guy with a square jaw. Was a soap opera actor, minor love interest in several movies before going back to school and eventually become a professor of anthropology. Moved to NYC from Bristol, UK for his first acting gig - getting a closet-sized studio in Jackson Heights where he met Navneet.

item.title: Navneet Jindal-Witten
item.description: Relationships Spouse Henry Jindal-Witten Son Harish Jindal-Witten Daughter Eesha Jindal-Witten Ella’s mother. Short (160cm / 5'4"), petite and perhaps more attractive than her husband. If undercut by her knowing it. Always super-fashionable and put together, she is the kind of person who would put on makeup before the apocalypse and take time to adjust it during.Trauma surgeon at New York Presbytarian in Queens. She is first-generation American born in Jackson Heights and met Henry while living with her parents while attending medical school at Columbia.

item.description: Ella has a haunted Thanksgiving

item.title: 01.015 Investigation
item.description: Ella takes the tooth to the applied physic’s lab

item.description: Ella spars with Craig, meets with her advisor

item.description: Ella spars with Craig and then goes out for Halloween

item.description: The bug squad needs some healing

item.description: Ella connects with her brother and starts bringing her mother in check

item.description: Ella spars with Donna

item.description: Ella goes home from the hospital and plans

item.description: The Aqrabuamelu fight a lot

item.description: Ella wakes up in the hospital

item.title: 01.005 The Date
item.description: Ella goes out on a date

item.title: 01.004 You Can't Go Back
item.description: Ella tries to find Ekerri but fails

item.title: 01.003 The Party
item.description: Ella goes to the pre-party of the Wild Hunt

This is where I think I will really lose any of the sticklers physicists since I clearly have no idea what I am talking about. So I ask for their forbearance and even dialogue around it. This chapter was also way too much exposition and nothing much has happened for a few chapters. I am unsure how balance the peaks and valleys since this is a serial and I didn’t plot those all in advance.

item.title: 01.021 - Reset
item.description: Ella lay in bed. The sunlight peeked through the drawn curtains and denied her sleep. She was tired after staying up the whole night but her mind kept racing through what she had heard. She pulled her phone out and started to write notes on it all. And seeing it in print left very few choices. She typed on her phone quickly and then slowed down as the conclusion became inevitable:

item.title: 01.002 One Month Later
item.description: Ella goes to study with Charlie but is entranced

item.title: 01.020 - Quant
item.description: I rewrote this chapter since the first version had too fast and predictable a resolution.

item.title: 01.019 - Anxiety
item.description: A small reference to Archer, one for the Witcher, and another to Dune. Because why not? Ella is doing what she can while still being in school but she knows it isn’t enough. And how do you investigate a secret. That took me a while to figure out and in the end you need a lead. And the paper I linked to, well it is about muons not measuring quite right and that is awesome stuff if you are trying to dig into the fundamentals of the universe.

item.title: 01.018 - Farflung Interests
item.description: Chile is just a lovely place. This story has to be global in nature as I mentioned before, and some of these folks we are going to see are going to have interests outside of the US. It is a US centric story, but that doesn’t mean other countries don’t have things going on. A lot of interludes and mini-stories will end up being one-offs of weirdness. Some may come back depending on how the story develops, so maybe instead of threads, they are seeds that may or may not sprout.

item.title: 01.017 Aqrabuamelu
item.description: This is a remix of Mesopotamian myths where the Akkadians come from warrior fanatic scorpion men and, if you know your history, eventually supplant the Sumerians. Hi there I Sorry Utu for casting you as the bad guy. No deities were harmed in the writing of this.

item.title: 01.016 Blooded
item.description: Ella needed a win for all the work she has been putting in. But wins shouldn’t be too easy and I wonder if this one was. But it was a plot dictated issue in that if she staggers home with significant wounds, that is going to be hard to write off. So let’s just say that ghula was a very, very weak one. If someone asks me about it, that is my story.

item.title: 01.015 Investigation
item.description: Ella has access to resources most people wouldn’t, being a physics grad student. So why shouldn’t she go stick things in a Scanning Electron Microscope or use other gear. I made her overly nervous and she could have walked in and just asked to use it which is something I think a lot of people would feel.

item.title: 01.001 Vision
item.description: Ella meets a strange Emperor

item.title: 01.014 Punked
item.description: Notice a common theme with Ella’s training? If you say getting knocked on her ass, you would be right. Obviously training the way she does only takes you so far for real fighting. Add knives, bites, and friends to an MMA match and it will go south fast. I am not a knife fighter by any means and my understanding is the loser is basically who bleeds out first. May have to do more research there.

item.title: 01.013 Sparring
item.description: Now you see the true power of Ella’s very mild enhanced healing. Since this is a rational, progression story with an entirely optional litrpg backbone, I wanted to have a bit of slice of life period showing that she is intensely following up on her action items. So this is part of the training montage for hand-to-hand. Since I know about fighting than physics expect me to spend more time on those scenes rather than her studying.

item.title: 01.012 Halloween
item.description: A bit more training montage, but I wanted to bring back in some magic and even a sense of wonder. I feel like I missed the mark a bit. But that is okay. I am not a hard magic guy for the most part despite some of my rpg type posts - my eyes glaze over at most hard magic systems, so I prefer it to be a bit ineffable.

item.title: 01.011 Breathe
item.description: I was going for that calm before the storm vibe here, she is mentally getting her head into the game a bit. Taking stock. Taking time with her family. I’ll probably come back and build this out when I do a big second pass to build on that feel more. But sometimes a chapter is just short.

item.title: 01.010 Prep
item.description: Dealing with one’s parents is often something that is brushed over in fantasy. You can’t have adventures with watchful parents. I somewhat get around this by having my protagonist be older, in grad school. But that doesn’t mean she is estranged from her family, just exasperated sometimes. Her father being an actor once and now a professor and her mother being a physician is intentional. She comes from an educated background but not one that is solely that way.

item.title: 01.009 Exposition
item.description: Who knew that dwarves were trolls? Sorry I couldn’t help myself. Obviously I wanted to subvert the trope a bit that dwarves were either fools like in LOTR or stoic. At the same time, I also added my own spin on them, making them rock-like creatures that are a bit more alien in nature than humans. There is always a bit of give and take with that since you have to balance their alieness with their ability to interact in a meaningful way with humans.

item.title: 01.008 Interlude Kennington
item.description: This chapter I am always going to say was super hard. First, I was trying to write a character I can’t even say I pretend to understand, a council estates kid in Kennington, London from Brixton. So I am going to completely fuck up the vernacular and regional differences. He is teamed up with a native East Londoner from Kennington and a Brazilian Portuguese girl and they run into a couple Haitian lwa.

item.title: 01.007 Again
item.description: This chapter was more difficult to write than the others - lots of establishing new characters and trying to imply familial relationships but with a hopefully light touch. Maybe I crammed too many conversations in here and didn’t let each one breathe, but it is a trade-off between endless dialog and moving things along, and in this story, it was just a bit of a breather. Next chapter will be radically different.

item.title: 01.006 Acceptance
item.description: This was all Ella needing to feel real, and I did not expect it when I wrote it. A lot of the time characters pull you along with their own actions, and you just let them. She kind of skipped from denial to the end. Was it truly acceptance or was it her just going a bit more wild? I kind of thought of her as a third date kind of girl, but sometimes your own characters surprise you.

item.title: 01.005 The Date
item.description: After the disappointment Ella experienced in her last chapter, I felt like I needed to kickstart the story with more evidence and someone else who maybe knows a little bit more than her. Most YA stories start with the parents dying so nobody can protect or explain what is going on - and the slow reveal is important to build this. But you can be slow, and you can be glacial.

item.title: 01.004 You Can't Go Back
item.description: Ella is very good at denial but the cracks are showing. She puts back on the denial at the end but how much longer can it last.

item.title: 01.003 The Party
item.description: I encourage you to channel some Sailor Moon magical girl sequencing here. Get your mind out of the gutter though - no semi-nude intermediate step.

item.title: 01.002 One Month Later
item.description: Yes it is a bit of a skip ahead, but often I find that the pacing of stories feels unrealistic. Also a month of having crystalline white eyes and putting in contacts to cover them makes it feel more real that she is back to living her life for the most part. And then you get ambushed by a party. A magical dance party in Harlem on your way up town.

item.title: 01.001 Vision
item.description: Welcome When I started this story, I had a couple goals in mind. A compelling character that struggles a bit with her identity, but is smart and capable; and also someone my children could see themselves as; To have flexibility in how the story progressed and the fantastical elements - to be able to switch genre freely; I wanted to have fun writing something; And although I hate litrpg in text, I wanted to track character development and abilities in a formal way using those stats rathre than having plot armor be the only driver; Other characters who behave in rational, adult ways, that have deep internal lives and motivations even if we don’t know what they are; and Finally I wanted to write a story for adults with adult themes and concerns.
